message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with the compression and representation of point clouds, which is a common problem in computational geometry (cs.CG) and data structures (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the use of the representation for surface reconstruction and mesh refinement, which are topics in computer vision (cs.CV) and graphics (cs.GR). Finally, the paper uses techniques from information theory (cs.IT) to achieve the compression.
